Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. It's not just an item; it's a statement of quality and excellence. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe its true value lies well beyond $120. However, I understand everyone has different budgets and preferences. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product for $150. This price includes free shipping and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
